channel.title: Smoking/Tobacco related products [Discussion]
channel.description:
This thread is not for people to dictate how bad smoking is for people. Neither is it a place to show off how "cool" you think you are.
Please do not bring your own stories here about how people have died. We know smoking is bad for us. It's not as if we don't know.
[u][b]This thread is to discuss tobacco, what you like to smoke, how you like to roll, what brands you use, filters, papers, flavors etc etc.[/b][/u]
So i'll open up. I'm about a 2-5 a day smoker. I love everything about it.
Mainly i smoke Golden Virginia as i find it to be the most consistently good brand. Use standard Rizla with slim filter tips. Yesterday, i bought some Amber Leaf Blonde, which is a new brand and holy shit, i fell in love with it. It tastes amazing. Perfect. I almost cried at how great it was.
I personally feel smoking is something you shouldn't be ashamed of. Tobacco smoking has been done since 1400bc, and i don't see why anything should change. Yes, we KNOW it's bad for us. But why should that stop us from doing it?
Anyway, post away. What do you smoke?

item.title: Smoking/Tobacco related products [Discussion]
item.dc:creator: @Kodiak Kodiak
item.description:
@Kodiak wrote:

Well this isn’t smoking but is tobacco; I like to dip grizzly wintergreen and different flavors of copenhagen. For some of you who don’t know what dip is, you may know it better as ‘chew’. It can be found in a round can and ground into small bits.

Read full topic

item.title: Smoking/Tobacco related products [Discussion]
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

[quote=“cows1471, post:1, topic:473599”]Oh, and to anyone who says it’s advertising, I see it like this.

I buy skyrim. I take screencasts and post them online. Am I advertising skyrim? No, I’m posting what I’m doing. Same goes for tobacco imo. Logo’s mean nothing really. You all know them. You’ve all seen them.[/quote]
Tobacco companies have sued the Norwegian government because of a Norwegian law forcing stores to hide cigarettes packs. I consider that to mean that logos mean something.

By posting screencast you are giving Bethesda free advertisement.

Read full topic

item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

i smoke florida cash because it’s addicting and it’s a great way to stay in shape. i smoke very often because it’s cool and it’s a great way to stay in shape. i smoke around 4 packs a day because it’s great and a it’s a great way to stay in shape. i started smoking when i was 12 because people pressured me and it’s a great way to stay in shape.

[quote=“Cole1497, post:23, topic:473463”][quote author=cows1471 link=topic=591397.msg4181819#msg4181819 date=1355618752]
This thread is not to discuss the maturity of other members or whether a new board should be added

Thank you David
[/quote]
this thread is not to point out what this threads purpose is

our discussion had relevance to this topic. a mature board would allow topics on the discussion of drugs, tobacco/alcohol products, and things of that nature.[/quote]

No, this topic was clearly stated as a discussion for tobacco. If you wish to discuss a new board and attempt to recatogorise certain threads, open a new thread for that discussion.

t4:

m8 when i smoke, i put a little tobaccy in a dish and mix it with jack daniels and toothpaste. i place the gummy mixture into my pipe and light up… chill for hours ya kno wha i mean

You’re about as funny as Brechtian theatre. Leave, and stop spamming needless and pointless messages in my thread.
